hero_title: Everything you need. One powerful platform.
hero_describe: Download videos, generate QR codes, share source code, and unlock a full suite of free tools — fast, simple, and built for everyone.
explore_describe: DLTeam delivers free tools and web design solutions that help you learn faster, create smarter, and connect better. In just a few clicks, download videos, generate QR codes, share source code, or launch a professional website tailored to your goals.
explore_media_download_describe: Paste a video link and instantly download high-quality MP4 or MP3 files. Supports major platforms with flexible formats — perfect for offline viewing or easy sharing.
explore_qr_describe: Create QR codes for URLs, text, contacts, or Wi-Fi. Customize colors, styles, and export as PNG or SVG. Crisp, reliable, and compatible with all scanners.
explore_share_code_describe: Access trending source code shared in clean, embeddable blog formats. Share instantly with teammates or friends — one click, zero friction.
explore_desgin_web_describe: From landing pages to full online stores, we design responsive, mobile-first, and SEO-optimized websites. Includes idea consulting, UI/UX design, and full deployment.
qrcode_title: Create High-Quality QR Codes for Free
qrcode_describe: Generate secure, scannable QR codes in seconds with DLTeam. Perfect for links, Wi-Fi access, business cards, and more — no signup required.
qrcode_chinh_sach: We respect your privacy. Your data is never shared. Learn more in our
qrcode_mota_hien: Your QR Code appears here instantly
qrcode_nc_title_pc: Choose a QR Code Style That Stands Out
qrcode_nc_des_pc_1: DLTeam offers a wide range of QR Code styles designed for both performance and aesthetics. From classic layouts to modern designs, every style is optimized for fast and accurate scanning.
qrcode_nc_des_pc_2: Pick Classic for maximum compatibility, Modern for a clean professional look, Soft Rounded for balance, Droplet or Rounded Droplet for a premium feel, or Bold Rounded for a youthful, dynamic style. Your QR Code, your brand.
qrcode_nc_title_ms: Customize Colors to Match Your Brand
qrcode_nc_des_ms_1: Easily customize QR Code colors to align with your brand identity or campaign theme. A simple color change can make your QR Code instantly recognizable.
qrcode_nc_des_ms_4: Tip: Use high-contrast colors for the best scanning performance.
qrcode_nc_title_logo: Add Your Logo for Brand Recognition
qrcode_nc_des_logo_1: Boost brand visibility by adding your logo or image directly into the center of your QR Code. Upload from your device and apply it in seconds.
qrcode_nc_des_logo_2: You can also use built-in logos from popular platforms like Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, and Zalo. All logos are optimized to ensure reliable scanning without sacrificing design quality.
qrcode_nc_des_kichthuoc_1: Scale your QR Code to fit any use case — from small digital placements to large print materials — without losing clarity.
qrcode_nc_des_kichthuoc_2: Recommended size: 200px–800px depending on display or print needs.
qrcode_nc_des_dinhdang_1: Download your QR Code in the format that fits your workflow. DLTeam supports flexible export options for both digital and print use.
footer_describe: DLTeam is a platform for sharing powerful tools and creative ideas — built to help you work smarter, learn faster, and connect better in the digital world.
